pageContext.display_address: 301 Wakara Way, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
pageContext.geocode_address: 301 Wakara Way, University of Utah, Salt Lake City, UT 84108, USA
pageContext.public_note: This is a full day LEGO Engineering camp in partnership with NHMU.  The NHM staff will have the kids half day and Play-Well have the kids the other half.  Students must be signed up for full day
pageContext.course_type_long_description: A Play-Well offering for girls who love to build! This course will provide a supportive environment for girls to build engineer-designed projects such as Motorcycles, Castles, Airplanes, and Monorails. Then use special pieces to create your own unique design! New and returning students can explore the endless creative possibilities of the LEGO® building system with the guidance of an experienced Play-Well instructor. There is no prerequisite for this course.
pageContext.course_type_name: (Retired) Girl Powered Intro to STEM with LEGO® Materials, Summer 2
